Title: Provides further targeted inflationary increases for designated programs
Summary: Provides further targeted inflationary increases for designated programs from the 2025-2026 state budget.
LawCode: Amd Part FF ยง1, Chap 57 of 2025
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part FF of chapter 57 of the laws of 2025, relating to establishing a targeted inflationary increase for designated programs, in relation to providing further targeted inflationary increases for designated programs
